optionsXSSWarning1.message: This is a feature intended for power users. If someone told you to copy and paste something here to enable a feature or "hack" something, it is a scam and will give them access to your browser.

optionsXSSWarning2.message: User scripts have access to all of the web extension APIs that can be used by Foxy Gestures. These APIs may be used to access browser history, download malicious JavaScript, or otherwise take over your browser. Never copy and paste a user script from an untrustworthy source.

optionsXSSWarningInfo.message: For more information see the following resources:

optionsXSSWarningLink1.message: The wikipedia article on cross-site scripting.

optionsXSSWarningLink2.message: The wikipedia article on self-XSS attacks.

tooltipRequiresPermissions.description: Tooltip for commands that require additional permissions.

modalAskPermissionPrompt.description: Prompt that appears at the top of the ask permission modal.
modalAskPermissionPrompt.message: Foxy Gestures requires the following permissions to enable this command.

modalAskPermissionRequest.description: Label for the button in the model to request optional permissions.

optionalPermissionBookmarksSummary.description: I copied this from the first paragraph of the MDN documentation.
optionalPermissionBookmarksSummary.message: The WebExtensions bookmarks API lets an extension interact with and manipulate the browser's bookmarking system. You can use it to bookmark pages, retrieve existing bookmarks, and edit, remove, and organize bookmarks.

optionalPermissionBookmarksLink.description: I copied this from the first paragraph of the MDN documentation.

optionalPermissionClipboardWriteSummary.description: I copied this from the first paragraph of the MDN documentation.
optionalPermissionClipboardWriteSummary.message: The clipboard API enables an extension to copy items to the system clipboard. Currently the API only supports copying images, but it's intended to support copying text and HTML in the future.

optionalPermissionDownloadsSummary.description: I copied this from the first paragraph of the MDN documentation.
optionalPermissionDownloadsSummary.message: Enables extensions to interact with the browser's download manager. You can use this API module to download files, cancel, pause, resume downloads, and show downloaded files in the file manager.

optionsRequestOptionalPermissionHelp.description: Help text to describe buttons that request optional permissions.
optionsRequestOptionalPermissionHelp.message: Optional permissions are requested automatically when assigning a command to a gesture. However, you can use these buttons to request permissions for use in user scripts.

optionsRevokeOptionalPermissionHelp.description: Help text to describe buttons that revoke optional permissions.
optionsRevokeOptionalPermissionHelp.message: You may revoke permissions to prevent access to the related API. All commands that require the permission will be un-mapped when the permission is revoked. This is useful if you are upgrading from a previous version where the permission was not optional.

labelRequestPermission.description: Help text to describe the buttons that request optional permissions.

labelRevokePermission.description: Help text to describe the buttons that revoke optional permissions.

commandCloseTabActivateLeft.message: タブを閉じて左側のタブをアクティブ化

commandCloseTabActivateRight.message: タブを閉じて右側のタブをアクティブ化

commandParentDirectoryTooltip.message: 上位のパスあるいは上位のドメインに移動します

commandOpenLinksInSelection.message: 選択範囲内のリンクを開く

commandOpenLinksInSelectionTooltip.message: 選択範囲に含まれるすべてのリンクをバックグラウンドで開きます

optionsBlacklistUrlPatternsHelp.message: Mouse gestures are disabled when the tab URL contains any of these patterns. Place one pattern per line and wildcard using asterisk. (e.g.: example.com/*/login)

optionsUserScriptsWellHelpPermissions.description: Help text that appears in the right well at the top of the user scripts tab
optionsUserScriptsWellHelpPermissions.message: Request optional permissions from the More Preferences tab if you require them.

optionsWhitelistUrlPatternsHelp.message: Mouse gestures are enabled when the tab URL contains any of these patterns. Place one pattern per line and wildcard using asterisk. (e.g.: example.com/*/login)

commandUndoCloseTooltip.message: Restore the most recently closed tab or window.

commandUndoCloseTabTooltip.message: 現在のウィンドウで最後に閉じたタブを復元します

commandUndoCloseWindowTooltip.message: 最後に閉じたウィンドウを復元します

commandSaveLinkAs.message: リンク先を名前を付けて保存

commandHistoryBackOrCloseTab.message: 前に戻る/タブを閉じる

commandHistoryBackOrCloseTabTooltip.message: 戻る履歴が存在しない場合に限りタブを閉じます

commandOpenLinkInNewForegroundTab|newTab.message: リンクを新しいタブで開く/新しいタブ
ジェスチャがリンクの上で開始された場合にはそのリンクを新しいタブで開き、そうでなければ空の新しいタブを開きます

commandOpenLinkInNewWindow|newWindow.message: リンクを新しいウィンドウで開く/新しいウィンドウ

commandOpenLinkInNewWindow|newWindowTool.message: ジェスチャがリンクの上で開始された場合にはそのリンクを新しいウィンドウで開き、そうでなければ新しいウィンドウを開きます

optionsGestureStyleCardinalHelp.message: Standard gesture directions that go up (U), down (D), left (L) and right (R).

optionsGestureStyleIntercardinal45Help.message: Adds diagonal directions left-up (Lu), left-down (Ld), right-up (Ru), and right-down (Rd). Directions are evenly distributed with 45° slices.

optionsGestureStyleIntercardinal60Help.message: Adds diagonal directions left-up (Lu), left-down (Ld), right-up (Ru), and right-down (Rd). Diagonal directions get a larger slice to make diagonal gestures easier to perform.

commandUnmuteAllTabs.message: すべてのタブのミュートを解除
